question_text: You observe that a record update for www.example.com is not reflected on some user systems, even after it was changed an hour ago. Which of the following is the most likely explanation?
answer_options: The CNAME record was deleted accidentally
The MX record was not refreshed
The record had a long TTL that hasn't expired yet
A resource record was changed to AAAA
correct_answer: The record had a long TTL that hasn't expired yet
explanation: TTL determines how long DNS entries are cached. If TTL is high, changes may not propagate until the cache expires.
